Blog.post: FIRST OF ALL...no sophmore...actually upcoming junior girls are welcome to read my blog anymore..cept for nik...so u can take this time and exit out..THX..bitches-- um on with this...bah so last night...me n glad had this movie thing planned for jsut me n her...lnog story short..--well so we get to go to cleve for the movie--yes it was ..hilarious haha bah and we come back and rent the movies..well while we r renting them..SUMONE calls and asks to see me...so im like alright u can come ovr..but he wants to say hey at blockbuster 1st..so we do..and he stops by..but seeing as my rents were pissed off at me for coming home that night they were like..dude i dont want ne1 comin ovr tonight..so i jsut went outside n talked to him instead..mmm its fine til i go back in and me n my mom ...freaking get into it..liek always..and i go upstairs and she continues to yell so i lean over the balcony and we r throwing stuff and just..absolutly screaming stuff at anothe.r.then she started name calling and ..u no i said my "choice words" and my dad come sin and is like SHUTUP..so bla..i ruined gledhills night b/c she had to leave b/c of my mom bein so childish so wudnt quit yelling...so yeahh..it sucked..but then it was better b/c then her n my dad jsut got ina fight so i went upstairs ...without my internet and SUMONE called..and we talked til 130 and it was rily good:) mmm kay so that summed up the night...--sowry gledhill..we will do it sum other time..promsie TODAY--wake up...clean..to get on their good side;) u no me...bla so everythings good--until im sittin on the stairs..clenaing or w/e and i see a bronco in my neighborhood and paul drives a bronco? right..well im like no way dude no way..so my fone rings and im liek ...shiiiiiiiiiiiit--so i run upstairs considering i HAVENT showered? and i drop to the floor undr my window and ignore the clal and liek my heart is goin crrrrazy and im like thinking of excuses..---mm so he comes..rings to doorbell and im liek laying there for 15 min..and im liek omg omg omg and hes calling like..ovr n ovr and im like..uh omg omg omg...finally he calls for the last time and leaves a vm and is like "damnnnnnit manda pick up ur fone.."and im liek bah NOOOOOOOOOO...so i grab my housephone and call up alison and im like dude...and tell her whats goin on--so we r both like wtf? mmm so wow..after this passes....i shower and grab sum food..go back upstairs and i call ali..shes like well bah aaron n paul can come over here...and so she calls paul and is like u guys can swing by and get myers on ur way here..so dude my dad comes home and i try to call paul and b like dude dont come my dad will just bring me......but um he doesnt answer and shows up at the front door right? right..so my dads a lil confused and this isnt good considering what happened last night and we argue..i win after 2 hours of it..and he takes me over..(that was DEFINATELY a looooong story short)...mm so we get there..watch secret window..hang out and what not..then they go..and me ali sara rowdy n b&j go to ruby tuesdays...bah..its packed but we see brooklyn and a bunch of ppl there...then we go to DB and i came home....talked to david bout NewYork and junk..he did good and im soooo proud of him:)...finally talked to trevor for a little b4 he left to go eat...:(i miss him sooooooo much..but yea..:(hmm and now im talkin to my gledhill bout last night lol:( and bout her mystery man..so yea----who know si mena honestly..i leave in...well since today is basicly thursday..i leave in 2 days:(and wow im scared as..yeeeea--i think im more scared b/c i am afraid of what im guna miss here..and i dont wana come back and everything be completely different ya no..kay wel idc if u do or dont? ... ugh so everything is goin good..im good..and im done--so ok..tomorrow is either guna b alis bday thing..or im guna see ..sumone..b4 i leave and junk..either way ull hear about it:)..hollllllllllla *"ouR lovE was...cOmfortaBle anD..soo broKen iN"*

hahahahahaha soooo...i have some blogging to ctah up with..hmm--alright 1st of all like..2 days ago? me and jeremy..bah..alright i dont know..i guess me and him are jsut guna..be together..but not..til we r ready to settle down again..he calls last night and we r both aparently rily hyper so we had a rily good convo..and then jon is with him and gets on the fone and is like "so i hear jeremy stills wants ya back and u guys r talkin again"..bah bah im like well the thing is jon...i dont rily no..umm i am laughing at alison rolling around on the floor so im jsut like u no..me and jeremy are me and jeremy? ..uh we r just goin with the flow..we are together but not dating and i was leik so ..there..and jons like well what can he do to make u happier..and im liek jon dude he sees other ppl more than me and i dont leik him tlaking to girls and jons like "dude he doesnt talk to girls i swear" so im liek well since jeremy is standing next to u ill tlak to him again..:) so we talk some mroe and we get off the fone eventually and..paul s calls...so bah hes drunk off his ass and me and him start singing together hahahahaha and then he starts yellin "HELLLLLLLLL YEA" and im liek alright BABBBBBBBBBBBY hahahaha..pauls hott and he sings to me:) hahaha so then we get off the fone b/c hes home and hes drunk..so aaron b calls..we have are usual 4am convos while in the meantime me and alison are laughing are ass off at..my HOLE and how i moon her hahaha...well b4 yday night..we decided to go to BEES...me al em and gledddhill--well we get there we r all in THE best moods ..so we notice this black dude sittin at the bar behind our table b/c hes tlaking rily loud..and eventually i notice him standing RIGHT smack behind me outa the corner of my eye tlakin on his fone..and hes liek broacasting it to the whole restuarant what the hell hes saying so finally alison..after staring his ass down ..says sumething loud enuf so he can hear it..hahahahahaha he glances at us but doesnt say anything...so he gets another clal and makes it a POINT to say at the top of his lungs "yo yo i feel like a fuckin manicane havin to stand up but if i dont my fone will go dead" so we r like..um bullshit nigggggga...hahaha so once agin he stands behind us only this time closer..so i turn around and we all like die laughing b/c hes like talkin to one of his pimp daddy hoes and hes like "yo bitch what comes after thrreeeeeee" he repaets himself like 40 times..so finally im liek FOUR FOUR FOUR FOUR...hahaha and once again we die laughing...so he shake shis head bla bla and gets back on the foen and is like "EVEN THE GIRL HERE IN THE BLUE SHIRT KNOWS" hahahah and we r all liek okkkkay there buddy...so then im liek yo alison grab these two quarters and walk over to the bar..sit down..and slam the quarters down and be like "WAD UP FIFTY" hahahahahahahahahahaha kay so we def die laughing ONCE again..even tho shes liek no dude...but it was fun talkin bout it for 20 min? hmmmm so then this old ass man comes with his wife they plop their grouchy asses at the tabl above ours and we r loud as hell and he starts complainign and saying he wants to move..so im liek alrigh tu no what..if he looks at us one mroe time im jsut guna look right back..so he does..and im leik yo wuts duh problem...so we stare each other down until i win and he quits his complaing..hahaha we ended up sitting there for 3 hours...as i paid in dimes...which btw i had four dollars left over..in dimes:) muahahaha.....THEN me gled and al came back here..kicked my dad out..and played sum ping pong..which yes alison beat me..twice..but i havent laughed that ahrd in 4ever as gledhill videotaped me dancing the whoel time..so i didnt realzie my "lingera"...

tonight..everyone came over..mm ali em heath braden--not every1 but kay..so bradens at his dads..(jere's step dad" and i am like come ovr n hang out u no b/c me n braden always hang out..so hes liek alrght b there in a few..so he pulls up and jeremys mom and mike brought him..and im like wow this is weird...and mm..kay so thats my awkward moment for the night?..so em gets here 1st and no1s home and i decide to NOT notify my rents that any1s coming...ah but they dont care? so me n em sit in the front yard w/ max..and like hes diving on us and tackling us..ya so that was my workout for the day--we sit on the back porch and ali n heath show up..bla bla bla--kay i changed my mind i dont feel the need to go over what happened tonight except braden destoyed heath with the ping pong ball right in the eye...muahahahahahahahahaha --:) kay so now i suppose im waiting for the paul fone call but i dont no..bah..i am rily confused about stuff--i no liek with all these ppl..not all of them will continue calling and itll die down..but still..im not confused about jw but like..i dont know? i dont have words..bah..i dont even wana tlak bout it b/c then i am jsut like ahhh i wana go to bed and forget about it--uh i hate being alone..like now that everys gone, i actually have time to think about stuff and i hate it i hae thinking..like if i never had to use my brain id b like so much better off--and every1 wonders why i fail..i dont leik to think..so thx--i dont think any of u no how ready i am to just be over everybody and have like no worries and nothing to get me upset...ugh its IMPOSSIBLE tho..its so..impossible..mission fucking impossible..hence/hints my name? W/E IT IS TREVOR jeez i dont want any corrections on the proper way to say hence or w/e the hell u say it is.BAH! umm alright well its 11 sumthin and im talkin to braden n gledhill...hoping trevor feels the need to call and check up..sinc ei havent seen him ina decade but....yah..my chances r slim..we left on bad terms:( mm super..if u think ur smart or calm enuf to deal with my emotional breakdown psychotic (howeve ru spell that word?) problems..have at it killer ill b waiting--holllller

mmm well last night wen i said paul called..he mentioned going to riverbend tonight..and asked me to go with him..? well i was like dude i duno u havent met my mom bla bla mm but he wanted to han gout afetrwards...so i duno..--just outa nowhere..i duno what to say about it yet..cept for hes called twice today already..so bah?...hmmm--so nik came ovr ..for 40 min or so? haha and we jsut sat upstairs n caught up on things..msotly talking about how fat ppl are but whatever makes me laugh--mm so C.M calls and asks me to come over...go figure? i was leik no thx ill pass...i think al is comin ovr tonight anyways if all else fails b/c we r both home alone so bah..so it was suppsoed to rain today but its liek perfect and i cudve gotten an assload of sun..but i painted sum purple thing aroudn my room..which btw is rily cute.. so ask me if im happy..thx--kay so i just tlaked to jere..n bah hes home frm the beach so yay--mm i wana see him:( its been like a while..bla..alright..so now i duno what the plans r for tonight..ahhh this blog has no meanign actually--mm well alright then im gona shower..in case of anything exciting..(im hopppppppppping)..so yea..and thats that

today...me n gledhill wake up go out side...tan all day and feast on burnt pizza..my fav...and so i come home..babysit and the calls start..mmm so paul sorah is hott but the night i was in cleve and he was on the fone with joe i assumed he was liek them so i was liek ah 4get him..but tonight paul called and eventually said he heard bout what happened and hes like "dont worry bout it i hate joe and dustin anyways they call to try to keep on good terms" and im like...thats embarressing that u no..and hes like..nah bah bah hes an ass...and we talk for an hour and a half..like laughing and crap and hes all "i liek tlakin to u ..u throw smart comments back at me unliek every1 else"...so im like u no hes alright...so yea...but then...kevin carter calls...and umm kay so every1 nos i think hes gorgeous? and he was like.."yd u run off the other night i was guna take u home"..and im like..speechless? trying to find words or something hahahahaha..prolly soudned liek an idiot..mm ok..idc:) hahaha well..anyways..so here i am..talking to braden liek i do every night b4 bed..hahaha so bah..he said i need to start running..im determining whether or not thats in insult or what...he said hed walk and i cud run..and thats just..embarressing that im slow..so :( thnk u braden(N)..mmm its 245 tho and im exhausted and can barely hold my eyes open so im goin to BEEEEEEED..im sleeping in tomorrow bitches..so yea...thnx..night:)

so today me em heath sara and rowdy all went to als to swim n whatever..which is what i needed..and even tho trev didnt make an appearence considering i havent seen him in 5 years..thats ok:(i guess ill see him tonihgt or something...mm so jeremy calls and says his mom got another week off off work and they might stay at the beach another week...? mm ask me if im happy--ya thnx b/c im not..WELL ..since my mom and her frind got plastered last night and decided to sing at the top of their lungs for all hours in the pitch black living room..? i got no sleep..so im kinda tired..bah..im goooooood tho..they r having another party tonight so i guess its another night upstairs...watching movies? i guess i can get one of em to run out and get me sum b4 the become..unable? mmm so the whole highlights deal..she hasnt called..so i def went out and bought sum ..like spray that u u in the sun and did a little touch up of my own muahaha...its not bad tho..my hair is natural so u cant tell wen i put highlights in anyways..mm so im thinking today and i wana see aaron? like to hang out with..b/c hes ..fun and hes cool to b around..but like in a way i feel liek i cant do that..jsut b/c..im rily trying to b..."monogomous" how ever the hell u spell it..right..wel my mom says ill nvr b able to get married b/c im not ..that M word..enough..mm go figure..--so today..sara comes and ..its def cold but me her n em decide to swim neways..as we find WHEETLE and shove it in alisons hair followed with beating of soccer balls and tanning lotion bottles to the head...mm so i love u alison but ur fun to beat up on;)..and then while alisons whoring up on heath .. me n em watch frm the fence muahahaha--can sara plz fall face first in the water..ok and then can i go comando in my skirt..alright..and now can i plz go ds and eat..BYE

so....without getting into details..everything is..normal again..and jeremy:) i love that kid..and that feeling has been tested many times lately..and it never fails..no1 else compares..--even tho the summer has been kinda off and on btw us..ive been waiting for the day where he just..goes back to normal and i can finallllllllly ..b happy..and i am..happppppy:)--hmmmm but okay last night? can i just say i have NO respect for any walker valley guys..like at all..kay thnx b/c they r all assholes and better just b greatful i didnt like cut them or something..they definately made me feel like i was a piece of ass..even though i know i didnt do anything to give them that idea..thats cool guys..mm i luv aaron bristol? b/c he like so saved me and ill always...have so much respect for u..so thank you:) bahhhh--mmm so tomorrow my treeeevor gets back from stupid basketball sumthin w/e..and i cant wait b/c i havent seen him in forevvvver:) and then im like leaving in a matter of days after that for damn mexico so all the mexicans can stare at all us girls..then ill pull my knife on them like ive been doing with everyone lately..im not a creep i swear haha...im jsut a girl..and i defend myself:) muahaha...mm so i DONT wana go AT ALL first of all..jeremy is at the beach right now and wen he gets home ill have like a week with him and then im leaving..so it makes me wana scream..its not fair? but i dont liek talking about it b/c then i just get rily pissed off and get in a fn bad mood...mm my moms bf kim is here..and i think we're bout to go shopping ina min..but i cant seem to make myself get in the shower? im not in the mood to shower..my showers r like 3 hours long..ughhhhhh i feel like..crap considering ever since my hair app. got canceled my mom has sum function where she hasnt called to reschedule..and well this is not making me happy..at all? so go fgure..until i get my hair done i will b one very fucking unhappy person..--ky so i am rily pissed now b/c...she wont fucking pick up the phone and call...can i please continue to sit here and tlak about absolutly nothing? thnx b/c i think i will...everyone and theri daddy is otua town..and like theres nota fuckin thing to do..its like..uh me nik ali em..bek even tho i nvr see her neways..sara..and shit thats about IT..so basicly im guna sit on my ass all day...well actually me n al HAVE to make an appearence at youth tonight considering we ARE going to mexico with them and we havent been to youth in many years so i dnt have a clue to what we r gon na b doin down there...bah ...well im guna walk my happy ass back downstairs and call the hair place myself..where am i guna come up with 170 dollars..IDK but where theres a will theres a way...so..have a great day.. *..-i love u i love u i love u love u yessss i do!-..*
i miss jeremy:( thanx...and im pathetic..idc:(
